Deities @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Andoletta]{Andoletta}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Arazni]{Arazni}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Count Ranalc]{Count Ranalc}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Doloras]{Doloras}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Likha]{Likha}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Naderi]{Naderi}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Narakaas]{Narakaas}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Pulura]{Pulura}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Ravithra]{Ravithra}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Shizuru]{Shizuru}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Sifkesh]{Sifkesh}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.The Lost Prince]{The Lost Prince}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Vildeis]{Vildeis}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Zyphus]{Zyphus}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Lament]{Lament}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Overflowing Sorrow]{Overflowing Sorrow}

You have a painful connection to melancholy and sadness.
name: Sorrow Domain
